char_info.desc: The Cousin of the Phantasmal Percussionist

a0.speaker: Reimu:
a0.dialogue: Man, why did Raiko act so similar to that maniac genocider this time?

a1.speaker: Reimu:
a1.dialogue: Plus, she mentioned a heretical god, so something fishy must have happened.

a2.speaker: Reimu:
a2.dialogue: Yukari has been too lax in inviting these gods into Gensokyo.

a3.speaker: Reimu:
a3.dialogue: Even the ones from that heretical sect emphasizing 'forgiveness'.

a4.speaker: Jeanne:
a4.dialogue: I sense someone speaking ill of the trinity... but maybe it is just my mind.

a5.speaker: Reimu:
a5.dialogue: So you are the person that Raiko mentioned earlier.

a6.speaker: Reimu:
a6.dialogue: I suppose being cousins make you look similar to Raiko, but you don't resemble her.

a7.speaker: Reimu:
a7.dialogue: Wait... Are you the person called 'the Son' in those babbles made by the people I have met?

a8.speaker: Jeanne:
a8.dialogue: Exactly! I must tell you this:

a9.speaker: Jeanne:
a9.dialogue: The Father has created this wonderful world, along with my pre-existence and the Spirit.

a10.speaker: Jeanne:
a10.dialogue: Every being should give praise to God.

a11.speaker: Reimu:
a11.dialogue: I am dichromatic too. Is your Father the same being as that weirdo I encountered a while ago?

a12.speaker: Reimu:
a12.dialogue: They broke my sky because they simply wanted a certain flood survivor to escape.

a13.speaker: Jeanne:
a13.dialogue: The Father wants to save her because she was the only good person left in her evil world.

a14.speaker: Jeanne:
a14.dialogue: Lately, my dearest Raiko has invited her to be a denizen of Horikawa.

a15.speaker: Jeanne:
a15.dialogue: In preparation for the Father and the Spirit's arrival, we awakened the trinity's powers and dominion over mankind.

a16.speaker: Reimu:
a16.dialogue: So your clan has 'adopted' that mad, bad, and impure person?

a17.speaker: Reimu:
a17.dialogue: That's something of a 'YHWH Conspiracy' set up by your god, similar to my homeland's 'Moriya Shrine Conspiracy'.

a18.speaker: Jeanne:
a18.dialogue: The wrath of God must be rained down those who speak ill of God and his plan to save the people of this impure land.

a19.speaker: Jeanne:
a19.dialogue: I can feel it, my Father's wrath will be aimed at this shrine maiden standing before me...

a20.speaker: Reimu:
a20.dialogue: It's useless to jinx me with these words. Those jinxing as far as I know only works on your believers.

a21.speaker: Reimu:
a21.dialogue: As a Shinto shrine maiden myself, I should be immune to these jinxes.

a22.speaker: Reimu:
a22.dialogue: If you don't get a life, you will be exterminated along with all of your believers, as seen by what I have done!

a23.speaker: Jeanne:
a23.dialogue: I shall declare that from my mouth.

a24.speaker: Jeanne:
a24.dialogue: A sharp sword shall emerge, in order to strike down this blasphemous maiden with the wrath of God the Almighty!
